summary: A book that will give a perk point every time it is read. Requires SKSE.
descriptionHtml:
Version 2.0 changes:
Reading the book from your inventory will now give you the choice of 1, 3, 5, or 10 perk points.

SKSE required! http://skse.silverlock.org/

A book titled "Ancient Text" will be automatically given to the player. Every time it is read you will receive 1 perk point. You can read it as many times as you like. Yes, this is a cheat item.

Physically, this book looks just like the Oghma Infinium.

Version for the Skyrim Special Edition:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2254/
author: Inigo21

files.name: Perk Point Book v2
files.changelogHtml: Reading the book from your inventory will now give you the choice of 1, 3, 5, or 10 perk points.
